page.title: 19Recreation
page.content: Most of the clubs are well supported. All age groups are catered for, though a survey indicated a lack of provision for 14-17 year olds in St.Boswells. The organisations generally meet in the Village Halls or Schools. Newtown has its own Community Centre. In the Arts there are few clubs.Anyone interested in operatic singing must travel to Melrose, Gala or Kelso. St. Boswells boasts a 35 piece silver band which has members from both villages. A drama group meets weekly to produce an annual play, and the P.F.A. produces a pantomime every two years. Many of the recreational activities are seasonal.People tend to be members of more than one club, and fund-raising depends upon mutual support. Despite the many clubs,many people prefer to travel for entertainment.
